# Remediation and Restoration Services - Shepody Healing Center

### Reference Number
cb-767-9600408

### Publication and Tender Information
* The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites qualified contractors to bid on a remediation and restoration services project for the Shepody Healing Center (SHC), Dorchester Penitentiary, located in New Brunswick, Canada.
* The principal objective of this project is to restore the SHC building to a safe and operable state, maintaining the standards of healthcare regulated by Accreditation Canada.
* Project Reference Number: 21207-25-4785239
* Publication Date: 2024-06-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-08, 13:00:00 (EST)

### Brief Overview
The CSC has a requirement for implementing remediation and restoration services to damaged water areas inside the SHC and affected adjacent spaces. This request is due to a damaged sprinkler head inside the SHC at Dorchester Penitentiary, triggering significant flooding and water damage.

### Scope of Work
Remediation and restoration of the affected areas, including the removal of water-damaged materials, drying of the affected areas, removal and disposal of materials containing hazardous substances, and restoration to meet healthcare standards.

### Contractor Requirements
* Timely completion of the project (8 weeks from contract award).
* Compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and standards.
* Providing skilled personnel, qualified in remediation work and relevant Health and Safety Regulations.
* Meeting necessary CSA and ULC certification standards for materials and equipment used.
* Not using Government of Canada materials, equipment, products, or tools.
* Ensuring all equipment used is in good condition.
* Compliance with all environmental regulations and removal of hazardous materials to the satisfaction of the CSC.
* Removing waste from government property in compliance with federal, provincial, and municipal regulations.
* Compliance with relevant fire and building codes.
* Far-reaching cooperation, information transparency, and regular updates.

### Contact Information
For more information and queries, please contact Matthew Couture, [Matthew.Couture@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Matthew.Couture@csc-scc.gc.ca), at (506) 378-8730.
